video_prompt: A luminous woman's hair gently flows, transitioning from cool blue to warm pink. Her eyes remain closed, showcasing a peaceful expression. Dynamic blue and pink light shifts and merges around her, creating fluid color blends on her skin. A feathered, glowing wing subtly expands behind her, while the background atmosphere softens with ethereal movement.
image_prompt: anime girl, serene expression, closed eyes, bi-color hair (blue and pink blend), glowing blue and pink light, feathery wing silhouette, dreamy atmosphere, subtle white garment.
refined_video_prompt: Her hair gently undulates, its luminescence shifting and blending between cool blue and warm pink. A peaceful expression subtly manifests on her face, with eyes remaining closed. Dynamic blue and pink light shifts, merges, and flows, casting fluid color blends across her skin. A feathered, glowing wing gradually expands behind her, as the background atmosphere softly drifts with ethereal movement.
